extendedInfo.description: An Expenses Tracker for those people who regularly accumulate expenses and want an easy way to manage them!Simple, quick and intuitiveFeatures:Easy entry of required informationHistory of previous entries made so that you don't have to keep entering informationShare your statements as CSV filesEasily manage your daily expenses so that you can quick recover the costs!

reviews.title: Lifechanger
reviews.comment: Made my life complete and fulfilled my experience of monitoring my expenses. No expense has been spared in enriching this app. No longer will I lose time at my expense. Expensing myself no longer expends me. Me and my receipts bundles once again can have happy times together.
reviews.author: A Google User
